THE NEW UNIVERSE FOR 
THE KLAYTN-BASED GAME NFTS
home.message:
Klaybay is a Klaytn-based game NFT marketplace. 
Discover extraordinary experiences
for gaming NFTs on Klaybay!

klaybay-js.OrdersSellTakerError: Sell taker must be null or matching buy maker
klaybay-js.OrdersBuyTakerError: Buy taker must be null or matching sell maker
klaybay-js.OrdersMakerTakerNotMatchingError: One order must be maker and the other must be taker
klaybay-js.OrdersBuyTimeError: Buy-side order is set in the future or expired
klaybay-js.OrdersSellTimeError: Sell-side order is set in the future or expired
klaybay-js.OrdersCheckSystemClockError: Error creating your order. Check that your system clock is set to the current date and time before you try again.
klaybay-js.OrderCalldataCanMatchError: Unable to match offer data with auction data.
klaybay-js.DeclinedToAutorizeBuyError: You declined to authorize your buy/offer
klaybay-js.DeclinedToAutorizeSellError: You declined to authorize your sell/auction
klaybay-js.NeedAtLeastOneSellOrderError: Need to make at least one sell order
klaybay-js.NeedAtLeastOneAssetOrderError: Need at least one asset to create orders for
klaybay-js.NotSameFactoryContractAddressError: All assets must be on the same factory contract address
klaybay-js.DeclinedToAthorizeFactorySellError: You declined to authorize your auction, or your web3 provider can't sign using personal_sign. Try 'web3-provider-engine' and make sure a mnemonic is set. Just a reminder: there's no gas needed anymore to mint tokens!
klaybay-js.IsApprovedForAllError: Couldn't get permission to approve these tokens for trading. Their contract might not be implemented correctly. Please contact the developer!
klaybay-js.MissingArgmuentFindingOwnerError: Missing an argument for finding the owner of this asset
klaybay-js.MissingOwnershipSchemaError: Missing ownership schema for this asset type
klaybay-js.FailedGetCurrentOwnerError: Unable to get current owner from smart contract
klaybay-js.TotalBountyTooLargeError: Total bounty exceeds the maximum for this asset type {value} Remember that Klaybay will add {value}% for referrers with Klaybay accounts!
klaybay-js.KlaybaySellerBountyTooLargeError: Total bounty exceeds the maximum for this asset type {maxTotalBountyPercent} Remember that Klaybay will add {klaybaySellerBountyPercent}% for referrers with Klaybay accounts!
klaybay-js.OrderHashMismatchError: Order couldn't be validated by the exchange due to a hash mismatch. Make sure your wallet is on the right network!
klaybay-js.GetProxyChainError: Couldn't retrieve your account from the blockchain - make sure you're on the correct blockchain network!
klaybay-js.InitializeProxyAddressError: Failed to initialize your account :( Please restart your wallet/browser and try again!
klaybay-js.InsufficientWrappedBalanceError: Insufficient balance. You may need to WKLAY.
klaybay-js.ValidateBuyOrderError: Failed to validate buy order parameters. Make sure you're on the right network!
klaybay-js.TooLargeFeesError: Invalid buyer/seller fees: must be less than {value}%
klaybay-js.NegativeFeesError: Invalid buyer/seller fees: must be at least 0%
klaybay-js.LeastExpirationTimeFromNowOrZeroError: Expiration time must be at least {value} seconds from now, or zero (non-expiring).
klaybay-js.ListingTimeCannotPastError: Listing time cannot be in the past.
klaybay-js.ListingTimeMustBeforeExpirationTimeError: Listing time must be before the expiration time.
klaybay-js.EnglishAuctionsMustHaveExpirationTimeErr: English auctions must have an expiration time.
klaybay-js.ExpirationTimeMustSecondsError: Expiration timestamp must be a whole number of seconds
klaybay-js.NegativeStartinPriceError: Starting price must be a number >= 0
klaybay-js.EnglishAuctionsMustUseWrappedTokenError: English auctions must use WKLAY or an KIP7/ERC-20 token.
klaybay-js.OffersMustUseWrappedTokenError: Offers must use WKLAY or an KIP7/ERC-20 token.
klaybay-js.EndPriceMustLessOrEqualStartPriceError: End price must be less than or equal to the start price.
klaybay-js.ExpirationTimeMustSetVaringPriceError: Expiration time must be set if order will change in price.
klaybay-js.ReservingPriceMustGreaterOrEqualStartPri: Reserve price must be greater than or equal to the start amount.
klaybay-js.BuyerBalanceNotEnoughToBuyError: Buyer has not enough funds to buy.
klaybay-js.YourBalanceNotEnoughToBuyError: You have not enough balance to buy.
klaybay-js.NetworkRejectedTransactionError: Oops, the blockchain network rejected this transaction. The exact error was {value}
klaybay-js.UnsupportedAssetSchemaError: Trading for this asset ({value}) is not yet supported. Please contact us or check back later!
klaybay-js.InvalidBuyOrderMatchError: Invalid buy order. It may have recently been removed. Please refresh the page and try again!
klaybay-js.InvalidSellOrderMatchError: Invalid sell order. It may have recently been removed. Please refresh the page and try again!
klaybay-js.MatchingOrderError: Error matching this listing: {value}. Please contact the maker or try again later!
klaybay-js.WhitelistingOnlyforNFTError: Whitelisting only available for non-fungible assets.
klaybay-js.FailedValidateSellOrderParametersError: Failed to validate sell order parameters. Make sure you're on the right network!
klaybay-js.NotOwnerError: You don't own enough to do that ({minAmount} base units of {address} {assetId})
klaybay-js.NotNullWalletAddressError: Wallet cannot be the null address

walletError.parse: Invalid JSON was received by the server. An error occurred on the server while parsing the JSON text.
walletError.invalidRequest: The JSON sent is not a valid Request object.
walletError.methodNotFound: The method does not exist / is not available.
walletError.unauthorized: The requested account and/or method has not been authorized by the user.
walletError.unsupportedMethod: The requested method is not supported by this blockchain provider.
walletError.disconnected: The provider is disconnected from all chains.
walletError.chainDisconnected: The provider is disconnected from the specified chain.
